0.1.name: wordpress/customquery
0.1.description:
Review your database, read out your tables and see whatÕs going on. Easily run custom queries on your database for upgrades or other maintenance tasks. With CustomQuery you allow your admins to do just that.

Features

  • Easy installation
  • Review database tables without editing them
  • Run custom queries on databases
  • Perform simple maintenance tasks on your database or individual tables
